steps.sql: SELECT material_id, left_number FROM warehouse_material ORDER BY left_number ASC LIMIT 1;
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID and remaining inventory quantity for all materials

steps.sql: SELECT name FROM materials WHERE id = '5';
steps.description: Retrieve the name of the material with the lowest remaining inventory
